metadata.titleEn: Geochemical data of ore bearing porphyry from Xietongmen I and II deposits in the Gangdise belt, southern Tibet
metadata.titleCn: 西藏南部冈底斯带谢通门I号和II号矿床含矿斑岩地球化学数据
metadata.description: The data are radioisotope dating data of ore bearing porphyry, major and trace geochemical data of whole rock and major and trace geochemical data of minerals. The samples were collected from the ore bearing granite porphyry of the Xietongmen Cu – Au deposit I and II in the Gangdise belt, southern Tibet. The U-Pb isotopic data were obtained by laser ablation inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry. The major and trace geochemical data of the whole rock were obtained by X-ray fluorescence spectrometry and inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry. The major geochemical data of apatite minerals were obtained by electron microprobe analysis, and the minor data of apatite and zircon minerals were obtained by laser ablation inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry. The geochemical characteristics and redox state of the ore bearing porphyry can be defined by the obtained data
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据为含矿斑岩放射性同位素测年数据，全岩主微量地球化学数据和矿物主微量地球化学数据。样品采集自西藏南部冈底斯带谢通门Cu–Au矿I号和II号矿床的含矿花岗斑岩。放射性同位素年代学数据是通过激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱仪分析锆石U-Pb同位素获得。岩石全岩主微量地球化学数据通过X荧光光谱仪和电感耦合等离子体质谱仪分析获得。磷灰石矿物主量地球化学数据通过电子探针分析获得，磷灰石和锆石矿物微量通过激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱仪分析获得。通过获得的数据，可以限定含矿斑岩的地球化学特征和岩浆氧化还原状态
metadata.instructions: All data are stored in Excel file. The file name "UPB. XLS" represents radioisotope data. The name of the file "wrmajtra" represents the major and trace geochemical data of the whole rock. The file name "apatite maj" represents the data of major elements in apatite. The file name "apatitetra" represents apatite trace element data. The file name "zircon tra" represents zircon trace element data.
metadata.instructionsCn: 所有数据以Excel文件存储。文件名称为"UPb.xls"代表放射性同位素数据。文件名称为“WRMajTra”代表全岩主微量地球化学数据。文件名称为“ApatiteMaj”代表磷灰石主量元素数据。文件名称为“ApatiteTra”代表磷灰石微量元素数据。文件名称为“ZirconTra”代表锆石微量元素数据。

authorList.unitCn: 中国科学院广州地球化学研究所

literatureList.titleEn: Geochemical characteristics and oxidation states of the Xietongmen ore-bearing porphyries: Implication for the genetic types of the Xietongmen No. I and No. II deposits, southern Tibet
literatureList.referenceEn: Chen, X.L., Liang, H.Y., Zhang, J., Huang, W.T., Ren, L., Zou, Y.Q. (2020). Geochemical characteristics and oxidation states of the Xietongmen ore-bearing porphyries: Implication for the genetic types of the Xietongmen No. I and No. II deposits, southern Tibet, Geological Journal, , 55，4691-4712.

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the data collection methods used to obtain geochemical characteristics of mineralized porphyries in the Gangdese belt of southern Tibet?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在南藏冈底斯带获取矿化斑岩的地球化学特征所使用的数据收集方法有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry, zircon U-Pb isotopic analysis, X-ray fluorescence spectroscopy, inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry, whole-rock major and trace geochemical data, electron probe microanalysis, major geochemical data of apatite minerals, trace analysis of apatite and zircon minerals
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱法，锆石U-Pb同位素分析，X射线荧光光谱法，电感耦合等离子体质谱法，全岩主要和微量地球化学数据，电子探针显微分析，磷灰石矿物的主要地球化学数据，磷灰石和锆石矿物的微量分析。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many mineral samples were collected from the Xietongmen Cu–Au deposits to obtain the geochemical data?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 从Xietongmen Cu–Au矿床收集了多少矿物样品以获取地球化学数据？
Quantification.AnswerEn: The original answer does not provide a specific numerical value for the number of mineral samples collected. Therefore, no refined answer can be extracted based on the given information.
Quantification.AnswerCn: 原始答案没有提供收集的矿物样本数量的具体数值。因此，基于给定信息无法提取出更精确的答案。

Definition.QuestionEn: What are the methods used to obtain radiometric isotope dating data in the context of geochemical analysis of mineralized porphyries?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在矿化斑岩的地球化学分析中，获取放射性同位素测年数据的方法有哪些？
Definition.AnswerEn: Radiometric isotope dating data are obtained through laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-ICP-MS) analysis of zircon U-Pb isotopes.
Definition.AnswerCn: 放射性同位素测年数据是通过激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱法（LA-ICP-MS）分析锆石的铀-铅同位素获得的。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection methods using laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry for zircon U-Pb isotopic analysis compare to those using X-ray fluorescence spectrometry for whole-rock major trace geochemistry in terms of precision and application in determining the geochemical characteristics and magmatic oxidation state of mineralized porphyry?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 激光烧蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱法（LA-ICP-MS）用于锆石U-Pb同位素分析的数据收集方法与X射线荧光光谱法（XRF）用于全岩主要和次要地球化学分析的方法在精度和应用方面的比较，尤其是在确定矿化斑岩的地球化学特征和岩浆氧化状态方面。
Comparison.AnswerEn: For zircon U-Pb isotopic analysis, laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-ICP-MS) is used, which offers high precision in dating geological samples by analyzing zircon minerals. This method is particularly effective for providing accurate radiometric ages. In contrast, X-ray fluorescence spectrometry (XRF) for whole-rock major trace geochemistry is more focused on determining the elemental composition of the rocks, providing broader geochemical data. While LA-ICP-MS is precise for isotopic dating and understanding the temporal aspects of mineralization, XRF is crucial for assessing the overall geochemical characteristics and magmatic processes influencing the mineralized porphyry. Both methods complement each other in offering a comprehensive understanding of the geochemical characteristics and magmatic oxidation state.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 对于锆石U-Pb同位素分析，激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICP-MS）被用于高精度地对地质样品进行定年分析，特别有效于提供准确的放射性年代。相比之下，X射线荧光光谱法（XRF）用于整体岩石的主要和微量元素地球化学，更侧重于确定岩石的元素组成，提供更广泛的地球化学数据。虽然LA-ICP-MS在同位素定年和理解矿化的时间方面具有高精度，但XRF对于评估矿化的岩浆过程和整体地球化学特征至关重要。这两种方法相辅相成，为理解地球化学特征和岩浆氧化状态提供了全面的视角。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences on understanding the geochemical characteristics and magmatic oxidation state of ore-bearing porphyries if laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-ICP-MS) is used extensively for analyzing zircon U-Pb isotopes and mineral trace elements?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 如果广泛使用激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICP-MS）分析锆石U-Pb同位素和矿物微量元素，那么对矿石承载的斑岩的地球化学特征和岩浆氧化状态的理解可能会产生哪些潜在后果？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using LA-ICP-MS for analyzing zircon U-Pb isotopes and mineral trace elements allows for precise age determination and detailed geochemical profiling, which can enhance the understanding of geochemical characteristics and the magmatic oxidation state of the ore-bearing porphyries. This method could lead to more accurate characterizations of the mineralization processes and the evolution of the magmatic systems in the southern Tibet Gangdese belt.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用LA-ICP-MS分析锆石U-Pb同位素和矿物微量元素可以实现精确的年龄测定和详细的地球化学剖面，这有助于增强对矿化特征和矿石承载斑岩的熔融氧化状态的理解。这种方法可能会导致对南藏冈底斯带矿化过程和熔融系统演化的更准确表征。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the procedures and instruments involved in collecting and analyzing radiometric age dating and geochemical data for mineralized porphyry samples in the context of southern Tibet's Gangdese belt?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在南藏冈底斯带矿化斑岩样品的放射性年代测定和地球化学数据收集与分析中，涉及的程序和仪器包括：
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Radiometric age dating data are acquired through laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-ICP-MS) by analyzing zircon U-Pb isotopes. Whole-rock major and trace geochemical data are obtained using X-ray fluorescence spectroscopy (XRF) and inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (ICP-MS). Major geochemical data for apatite minerals are collected through electron probe microanalysis, and trace data for apatite and zircon minerals are analyzed using LA-ICP-MS.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 放射性年龄测定数据通过激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICP-MS）分析锆石的铀-铅同位素获得。全岩主要和微量地球化学数据使用X射线荧光光谱法（XRF）和电感耦合等离子体质谱法（ICP-MS）获得。磷灰石矿物的主要地球化学数据通过电子探针显微分析收集，磷灰石和锆石矿物的微量数据则使用LA-ICP-MS进行分析。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What analytical techniques enable the precise determination of geochemical characteristics and magmatic oxidation states in mineralized porphyry samples?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些分析技术能够精确确定矿化斑岩样品的地球化学特征和岩浆氧化状态？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The precise determination of geochemical characteristics and magmatic oxidation states in mineralized porphyry samples is enabled by using laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-ICP-MS) for zircon U-Pb isotopic analysis, X-ray fluorescence spectrometry (XRF), and inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (ICP-MS) for whole-rock major and trace geochemical data, as well as electron probe microanalysis (EPMA) for major geochemical data in apatite minerals. Additionally, trace analyses in apatite and zircon minerals are performed using LA-ICP-MS.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 通过激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICP-MS）对锆石进行U-Pb同位素分析，可以精确确定矿化斑岩样品的地球化学特征和岩浆氧化状态，同时使用X射线荧光光谱法（XRF）和电感耦合等离子体质谱（ICP-MS）获取全岩主要和微量地球化学数据，以及电子探针显微分析（EPMA）获取磷灰石矿物的主要地球化学数据。此外，磷灰石和锆石矿物的微量分析也使用LA-ICP-MS进行。
